pasuwa waraya, wawili karmantha niyojya amathya dhura hebawu ohu kathanayakawaraya lesa path wimata pera warimarga ha jala kalamanakarana menma waraya saha guwan sewa amathya dhura da hobawa thiyenawa.wipaksha nayaka dhurayata path wiya haki bawata wartha wana thawath manthriwarayeku wanne es. bi. disanayakayi. 1989 wasaredi mulwarata ohu parlimenthuwata piwisenne nidahas paksha manthriwarayeku washayen. 1994 wasaredi yeruwana katayuthu ha krida amathya dhurayata pathwana es. bi. disanayaka shri lanka nidahas pakshaye maha lekam dhuraye da katayuthu kara thibenawa. 2001 wasaredi eksath jathika pakshayata ekwu ohu ehi jathika sanwidhayakawaraya lesada katayuthu kala. 2009 wasaredi nawatha nidahas pakshayata sambandha wana es. bi. disanayaka manthriwaraya mahinda rajapaksha rajaye usas adhyapana amathya dhuraye katayuthu kala.

2015 janawari 09 dina janadhipathiwaraya lesa diwrum di itha sulu mohothakin ewakatath parlimenthuwe 2/3ka manthriwarunge kamaththen agamathiwa siti di.mu. jayarathna agamathi dhurayen iwath kirimak ho nokara parlimenthu manthriwarun 42ka ge kamaththa thibu ranil wikramasinha mahatha agamathi lesa path kara gaththe ya.
me sinama pataya thiragatha wune me wasare (2012) juni masa 22 amarikawedi.
